 Loading data and calculation of moving averages

```{r}

library(quantmod)
library(TTR)

getSymbols ("CL=F", src = "yahoo")    # from yahoo finance

chartSeries(to.daily(`CL=F`['2016::2018']), theme = "white")
addEMA(7, col = "red")
addEMA(20, col = "purple")


```
